name: Fort Williams Park
description: For Portland dog owners, Fort Williams Park at 1000 Shore Rd has become a reliable favorite—4.8 stars from 3,378 reviews. For dog owners seeking a tried-and-true destination, this park delivers consistently. Other popular dog parks nearby include Hinckley Park (2.0 miles) and Bug Light Park (2.1 miles)—both favorites among local pup parents.

name: Presumpscot River Preserve
description: Presumpscot River Preserve (4.8 stars from 195 reviews) is a popular destination for Portland dog owners, located at 99 Overset Rd. For dog owners in the area, this park has become a trusted spot for time with their pups. Dog owners exploring the neighborhood can also bring their furry friends to Oat Nuts Park (0.5 miles).

name: Bug Light Park
description: In Portland, Bug Light Park stands out with 4.7 stars from 2,249 happy dog owners. Open from 6am to 10pm daily, dog owners can plan visits around their pup's favorite times to be active. Keep the adventure going at other nearby dog parks like Hinckley Park (0.7 miles) or McIntyre Park (1.0 miles).

name: Hadlock Field

name: Fort Allen Park
description: 1,870 dog owners have made Fort Allen Park (49 Eastern Promenade) one of Portland's most trusted parks (4.7 stars). description: Dog owners in Portland have made Fort Sumner Park at 64 North St a go-to spot, rating it 4.7 stars across 197 reviews. description: Dog owners in Portland have made Eastern Promenade Trail a go-to spot, rating it 4.7 stars across 185 reviews. description: Happy Tails (4.6 stars from 106 reviews) is a popular destination for Portland dog owners, located at 119 Bishop St. The park has earned its reputation among dog owners in the neighborhood as a reliable choice.
